QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: offlineEditingCruiseSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value defines the default speed for calculating mission statistics for vehicles which do not support hover or VTOL vehicles in fixed wing mode. It does not modify the flight speed for a specific flight plan.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: offlineEditingHoverSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value defines the default speed for calculating mission statistics for multi-rotor vehicles or VTOL vehicle in multi-rotor mode. It does not modify the flight speed for a specific flight plan.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: offlineEditingAscentSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value defines the ascent speed for multi-rotor vehicles for use in calculating mission duration.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: offlineEditingDescentSpeed
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value defines the cruising speed for multi-rotor vehicles for use in calculating mission duration.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: batteryPercentRemainingAnnounce
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Announce the remaining battery percent when it falls below the specified percentage.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: defaultMissionItemAltitude
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: This value specifies the default altitude for new items added to a mission.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: audioMuted
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled all audio output will be muted.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: virtualJoystick
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled the virtual joystick will be shown on the Fly view.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: virtualJoystickAutoCenterThrottle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If enabled the throttle stick will snap back to center when released.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: gstDebugLevel
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Sets the environment variable GST_DEBUG for all pipeline elements on boot.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: useChecklist
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled the preflight checklist will be used.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enforceChecklist
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Preflight checklist must pass before arming
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is enabled the preflight checklist must pass before arming.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: enableMultiVehiclePanel
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Enable Multi-Vehicle Panel when multiple vehicles are connected.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: appFontPointSize
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: The point size for the default font used.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: indoorPalette
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: The color scheme for the user interface.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: savePath
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Directory to which all data files are saved/loaded from

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: androidSaveToSDCard
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Application data is saved to the sd card

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: mapboxToken
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Your personal access token for Mapbox maps

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: mapboxAccount
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Your personal account name for Mapbox maps

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: mapboxStyle
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Map design style ID for Mapbox maps

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: esriToken
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Your personal access token for Esri maps

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: customURL
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: URL for X Y Z map with {x} {y} {z} or {zoom} substitutions. Eg: https://basemaps.linz.govt.nz/v1/tiles/aerial/EPSG:3857/{z}/{x}/{y}.png?api=d01ev80nqcjxddfvc6amyvkk1ka

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: vworldToken
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: Your personal access token for VWorld maps

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: followTarget
QGC.MetaData.Facts.enumStrings: Never,Always,When in Follow Me Flight Mode

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: qLocaleLanguage
QGC.MetaData.Facts.comment: QLocale::Language id. Fact enum metadata is setup in AppSettings code. QGC reboot required in order to load new json translations into FactMetaData.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: disableAllPersistence
QGC.MetaData.Facts.longDesc: If this option is set, nothing will be saved to disk.

QGC.MetaData.Facts.name: firstRunPromptIdsShown
QGC.MetaData.Facts.shortDesc: Comma separated list of first run prompt ids which have already been shown.
